table_caption: Brain areas demonstrated significantly different VMHC values between CSA and NC group. Notes: The statistical threshold was set at voxel level with P < 0.05 for multiple comparisons using Gaussian random field theory voxels with P < 0.01 and cluster size > 40 voxels, Alphasim corrected. VMHC Voxel-mirrored homotopic connectivity, CSA children with strabismus and amblyopia, NCs normal controls, BA Brodmann area, MNI Montreal Neurological Institute.
